results.title: Simvastatin improves clinical scores in a rabbit multiple infarct ischemic stroke model: synergism with a ROCK inhibitor but not the thrombolytic tissue plasminogen activator.
results.text_hl: For these studies, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ was administered up to 3 hours following @<m>DISEASE_Embolism</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004617 @@@embolization@@@, and behavior was measured 48 hours following @<m>DISEASE_Embolism</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004617 @@@embolization@@@ to calculate the dose of @DISEASE_Intracranial_Embolism @DISEASE_MESH:D020766 @@@emboli@@@ (P(50) in mg) that produces @DISEASE_Neurologic_Manifestations @DISEASE_MESH:D009461 @@@neurological deficits@@@ in 50% of the @SPECIES_9986 @@@rabbits@@@.

citations.NLM: Lapchak PA, Han MK. Simvastatin improves clinical scores in a rabbit multiple infarct ischemic stroke model: synergism with a ROCK inhibitor but not the thrombolytic tissue plasminogen activator. Brain Res. 2010 Jul 16;1344():217-25. PMID: 20493175
citations.BibTeX: @article{20493175, title={Simvastatin improves clinical scores in a rabbit multiple infarct ischemic stroke model: synergism with a ROCK inhibitor but not the thrombolytic tissue plasminogen activator.}, author={Lapchak PA and Han MK}, journal={Brain Res}, volume={1344}, pages={217-25}}

results.title: The 3-hydroxy-3-methylglutaryl coenzyme A reductase inhibitor simvastatin reduces thrombolytic-induced intracerebral hemorrhage in embolized rabbits.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ treatment significantly decreased @GENE_PLAT @GENE_5327 @@@tPA@@@-induced @DISEASE_Hemorrhage @DISEASE_MESH:D006470 @@@hemorrhage@@@ incidence (p=0.022) and volume (p=0.0001) following @<m>DISEASE_Embolism</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004617 @@@embolization@@@.

citations.NLM: Lapchak PA, Han MK. The 3-hydroxy-3-methylglutaryl coenzyme A reductase inhibitor simvastatin reduces thrombolytic-induced intracerebral hemorrhage in embolized rabbits. Brain Res. 2009 Dec 15;1303():144-50. PMID: 19781532
citations.BibTeX: @article{19781532, title={The 3-hydroxy-3-methylglutaryl coenzyme A reductase inhibitor simvastatin reduces thrombolytic-induced intracerebral hemorrhage in embolized rabbits.}, author={Lapchak PA and Han MK}, journal={Brain Res}, volume={1303}, pages={144-50}}
